name: Swing Bound
description:
Use the chain that binds you as a weapon! 

Defeat the sinister orange enemies before they surround you. Use the momentum of your movement to swing the ball of energy at the enemies to defeat them. 

Clear each stage of enemies to win.  Currently 6 stages in total.

Controls: 

- WASD: Up, Left, Down, Right movement

- Spin yourself around to swing the energy ball around and attack

   - Hitting the enemies with the energy ball will defeat them!

- Escape: pause game.
